DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim study compare ocular movement abnormality male pre-mutation FRM1 gene ( symptomatic asymptomatic motor plan and/or cognitive plan ) , male without pre-mutation male multi-systematized atrophy , order identify neuronal structure implicate pathology .
DOC.brief_title: Analysis Oculo-motor Deficiencies Associated With FMR1 Gene Expression ( Genetic Abnormality Predisposing Neurodegenerative Disease )
DOC.detailed_description: Patient follow Nantes hospital half day : - examination ocular movement - perform Neuro-psychological test ( MATTIS ) - perform test scale motricity ( UPDRS , CRST , ICARS ) .
DOC.criteria: FOR PATIENTS WITH PREMUTATION ON FMR1 GENE ( 30 patient expect ) : Inclusion criterion : Male > equal 50 year old Ally second third degree child affect `` fragile X '' Not live far Nantes visit Nantes hospital easy Premutation FMR1 gene Signed informed consent Exclusion criterion : Female < 50 year old visual acuteness < 1/10 MATTIS dementia scale < 100 ( normal:144 ) Occurrence , show MRI ( Magnetic Resonance Imaging ) , pathology either ischemic vascular hemorrhagic tumoral FOR PATIENTS WITHOUT PREMUTATION ON FMR1 GENE ( 10 patient expect ) : Inclusion criterion : Male > equal 50 year old Ally second third degree child affect `` fragile X '' Not live far Nantes visit Nantes hospital easy Signed informed consent Exclusion criterion : Female < 50 year old visual acuteness < 1/10 MATTIS dementia scale < 100 ( normal:144 ) Premutation FMR1 gene Occurrence , show MRI , pathology either ischemic vascular hemorrhagic tumoral FOR PATIENTS WITH MULTISYSTEMATIZED ATROPHY ( 10 patient expect ) : Inclusion criterion : Male > equal 50 year old Not live far Nantes visit Nantes hospital easy `` probable '' diagnosis multisystematized atrophy Signed inform consent Female < 50 year old visual acuteness < 1/10 MATTIS dementia scale < 100 ( normal:144 ) Occurrence , show MRI , pathology either ischemic vascular hemorrhagic tumoral
